original_text: to seize spoil and carry off plunder, to turn your hand against the waste places that are now inhabited, and the people who were gathered from the nations, who have acquired livestock and goods, who dwell at the center of the earth.
korean_text: 물건을 겁탈하며 노략하리라 하고 네 손을 들어서 황폐하였다가 지금 사람이 거주하는 땅과 여러 나라에서 모여서 짐승과 재물을 얻고 세상 중앙에 거주하는 백성을 치고자 할 때에

sentences.original_text: to seize spoil and carry off plunder
to turn your hand against the waste places
who were gathered from the nations
who have acquired livestock and goods
who dwell at the center of the earth
